Class GamesController

  • java.lang.Object
    • cygni.GamesController

  • @RestController
 @RequestMapping(value="/api")
public class GamesController
extends java.lang.Object
    The class that handles the calls made to the rock-paper-scissor-API.

        @PostMapping(value="/games")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.lang.Long> createGame(@RequestBody
                                                                                                        Player creator)
        Accessible at POST /api/games. Creates a new game with the specified player as its creator.
        Parameters:
        creator - The creator of the game.
        Returns:
        Returns the id of the new game.

      • joinGame

        @PostMapping(value="/games/{id}/join")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.lang.String> joinGame(@PathVariable
                                                                                                                  java.lang.Long id,
                                                                                                                  @RequestBody
                                                                                                                  Player joiner)
        Accessible at POST /api/games/{id}/join. Joins the specified player to the specified game.
        Parameters:
        id - The id of the game.
        joiner - The player who wants to join the game.
        Returns:
        A HTTP-response.

      • makeMove

        @PostMapping(value="/games/{id}/move")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.lang.String> makeMove(@PathVariable
                                                                                                                  java.lang.Long id,
                                                                                                                  @RequestBody
                                                                                                                  PlayerMove move)
        Accessible at POST /api/games/{id}/move. Updates the game with the specified move for the player.
        Parameters:
        id - The id of the game.
        move - The move made by the specified player.
        Returns:
        A HTTP-response.

      • game

        @GetMapping(value="/games/{id}")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Game> game(@PathVariable
                                                                                            java.lang.Long id)
        Accessible at GET /api/games/{id}. Shows the state of the game.
        Parameters:
        id - The id of the game.
        Returns:
        Returns the state of the game.
